Class JukeboxAccountCollection

  • Object
    • JukeboxAccountCollection

  • public class JukeboxAccountCollection
extends Object
    This class keeps a collection of accounts and which accounts are administrators.
    Author:
    Alexis Tinoco Modified: David Wang
